Joschka Flintz is a research assistant at Ruhr-university Bochum and doctoral researcher in the RTG Regional Disparities and Economic Policy. Joschka's research interests include environmental economics, regional and urban economics, especially with regards to mobility and transportation issues, as well as applied microeconometrics.

## Education

Ruhr University Bochum \| PhD student \| Oct 2021 - present

Ruhr University Bochum \| Bochum M.Sc in Economics \| Sept 2011 - June 2015

Ruhr University Bochum \| Bochum B.Sc in Management & Economics \| Oct 2014 - June 2011
